mapper.select: select A.Project_ID,A.Longitude,A.Latitude,A.community_Name,A.Province_Id, A.City_Code, A.District_Code, Building_NO,Room_Number,layout,renovation,B.T_House_ID,b.house_Id from t_project A, T_HOUSE B WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = B.PROJECT_ID AND B.Status = '1' order by A.Project_ID , B.AREA,A.Total_Floor DESC,B.Long_Price ASC

select distinct A.Project_ID,A.Longitude,A.Latitude,A.community_Name,A.Province_Id, A.City_Code, A.District_Code, Building_NO,Room_Number,layout,renovation,B.T_House_ID,b.house_Id from t_project A, T_HOUSE B WHERE A.PROJECT_ID = B.PROJECT_ID AND A.Longitude > #{lngButtom} AND A.Longitude <#{lngTop} AND A.Latitude > #{latLeft} AND A.Latitude <#{latRight} AND B.Status = '1' order by A.Project_ID , B.AREA,A.Total_Floor DESC,B.Long_Price ASC
